summary:
GUERILLA APIS: INTEGRATING WEB SYSTEMS THAT WEREN'T DESIGNED TO BE
INTEGRATED

Thursday 12:15 p.m.--1 p.m.

Audience level: Intermediate

DESCRIPTION In an ideal world, every web system would provide a well
designed REST API with oAuth authentication. But what do you do when
those things don't exist?

ABSTRACT In an ideal world, every web system would provide a well
designed REST API with oAuth authentication. But what do you do when
that doesn't exist?

In this talk, Russell Keith-Magee will explore some unorthodox
techniques for extracting and inserting information into the sort of
systems you see in the real world outside Silicon Valley -- systems that
don't provide a nice ReSTful API.
title: Guerilla APIs: integrating web systems that weren't designed to be integrated
